summary: "Baywatch" is an American TV show about lifeguards in California and Hawaii, led by David Hasselhoff. It followed their work and personal lives. Though canceled after its first season, it became a global hit through syndication, with over 1.1 billion viewers weekly. Despite bad reviews, it became a pop culture phenomenon. The show ran from 1989 to 2001, with a spin-off and a movie following. It featured many actors, like Pamela Anderson and Yasmine Bleeth.
title: Baywatch
